spells.name: Devolution
spells.description: An eidolon temporarily loses 1 evolution +1/five levels.

spells.name: Evolution Surge
spells.description: Grants eidolon an evolution with 4 evolution points.

spells.name: Rejuvenate Eidolon
spells.description: As lesser rejuvenate eidolon, but cures 3d10 damage +1/level (max +10).

spells.name: Seek Thoughts
spells.description: Detects creatures in the area thinking about something.

spells.name: Spiked Pit
spells.description: As create pit, but filled with spikes.
